name: HyperDrones
description:
Join the flying revolution! Car races are so outdated, HyperDrone racing is now a thing!

And it’s a fierce competition up there in the sky. Just don’t get distracted by the other players or by the stunning environment.

Follow the flight path and collect all the checkpoints to unlock the next level. Tap and hold to fly your drone and gently swipe to change direction.

Ready for a fun ride?
